HERO.NAME: Denys Goida
HERO.TITLE: Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer
HERO.DESCRIPTION: I design interfaces in Figma and implement them in scalable Angular architectures (CRM, high-load systems). Professionally using RxJS, NgRx, Gulp. I know how to find the balance between design aesthetics and code performance.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills & Competencies
SKILLS.SUBTITLE: Progress bars reflect my proficiency in key tools and technologies.

ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Frontend Developer | UI/UX Designer. My passion is creating intuitive, fast, and visually stunning web applications, paying special attention to architecture and user experience.
ABOUT.VISION_FULLSTACK_DESC: Evolving towards a Full Stack level, mastering C#, C++, and Python to create powerful solutions.
ABOUT.VISION_AI_DESC: My vision for the future of web: developing applications with integrated Artificial Intelligence.
ABOUT.PHILOSOPHY_ENG_DESC: Clean code with TypeScript and Angular for long-term stability.
ABOUT.UNI_DESC: Computer Science student. System Engineering specialization.
ABOUT.EXP_SENIOR_DESC: Architecture based on Standalone Components and RxJS.
ABOUT.CERT_DESC: Proficient mastery of the modern web stack.

PERFORMANCE.TITLE: High Performance
PERFORMANCE.DESC: Optimized Angular applications with lazy loading and Signals for maximum speed.

RESPONSIVE.TITLE: Full Responsive
RESPONSIVE.DESC: Pixel-perfect layouts for all devices from mobile to ultra-wide screens.

UIUX.TITLE: Clean UI/UX
UIUX.DESC: Modern design with smooth animations and intuitive navigation for best user experience.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
CTA.SUBTITLE: I'm always open to discussing new projects and creative opportunities.

MAIN_PORTFOLIO.description: Fully functional Angular SPA with multi-language support and dynamic project loading.
